title: Britannica.Puzzle.Potpourri-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents -=-



Britannica Puzzle Potpourri (c) Idigicon



Release On : 27 December 2008 Disk Amount/Format : 1 CD ISO

Type of Game : Puzzle Media Protection : Nothing



Release Information:



Britannica Puzzle Potpourri has over 1000 entertaining and challenging

jigsaw puzzles made from stunning professional images. Choose from a range

of categories"or create custom puzzles using your own pictures!



The easy-to-use interface supports JPG, PNG, BMP, TGA, PCX, and more,

without complicated importing. Just choose a photo from the browser, pick

your preferences, and play!Change size, style, and thickness on the fly.

Adjust shape, outline, oddness, and scale settings. Even select your

favorite background color and add your own music. With so many incredible

features, it's easy to create the perfect puzzle!



Change puzzle size, style, and thickness on the fly



True dynamic enlarge/minimize feature



Connect, show, and place pieces



Arrange pieces at edges, in a grid, or randomly



Use trays to store solved sections



Save partially completed puzzles



1000+ jigsaw puzzles



6 styles of pieces



From 4 to 5000+ pieces per puzzle



4 levels of difficulty plus custom settings



Shape, outline, oddness, and scale settings



Custom background colors



MP3, WMA, and WAV support plus built-in music



Burn/mount, install, then play
